page.title: 16BUILDINGS
page.content: There are lots of buildings in Rookhope. Most of them are very old houses, apart from the Crescent. There are six new houses in the Crescent. They are about ten years old. Barrington Cottage used to be the school. Now, it has four bedrooms. The house on the corner opposite the Post Office was the school too at one time. Most people have semi-detached houses. In Rookhope nearly everyone has a telephone. Some houses are holiday cottages. There is a church, chapel, working men's club, post office, co-op and a village hall.
